text: [Music]
so I work for Standard Bank of South
Africa um The Standard Bank group were
Africa's largest bank so we're
headquartered in South Africa but I work
for the bank in New York and my job at
Standard Bank um I'm the head of a group
called The International Development
Group and I look after a segment of our
clients that are involved in the donor
flows into Africa I think when we look
at at working with um the international
donors um to Africa those flows still
make up about 30 % of the flows to the
continent so it's a significant amount
of resources and the way we look at this
customer base is rather than just trying
to sell them banking services which of
course we do um but it's to think about
how can we be part of the development
outcomes that our customers are trying
to achieve part of my job uh really
coming out a development background is
to be able to understand what it is that
African governments are trying to
achieve in terms of poverty reduction um
understand what their donor partners are
trying to achieve in collaboration and
then to think about how our bank can be
part of that solution so one of the
initiatives that we've been thinking
about and we've been working on is
working with the US government around
their initiatives on power Africa and um
as you may know electricity is a key
constraint to growth on the continent um
there's something like approximately 30%
of of Africans have access to power and
as you can imagine that's a key
constraint to Growing businesses that's
a key constraint um to to to individual
growth and we recognize that being able
to invest in power on the continent
really requires a whole host of players
uh to make that work so if the bank is
going to invest in an independent power
project we need um the African
governments to be on board with that
idea creating the regulatory environment
you need the donor flows for the
long-term financing and then we can
bring the structuring and so this is one
area where we really see that all of our
interests are aligned um from the
private sector governments donor
organizations and so again that's part
of my my job is to try and help bring
those those pieces together
[Music]
